historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 2-308.20.

1981 Ed., § 1-1188.20.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 made a technical correction to the enacting clause of D.C. Law 19-21, § 9004(b) that did not change the repeal of this section

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-308.07.

For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 2-351.15.

Miscellaneous Notes

Short title: Section 1061 of D.C. Law 19-21 provided that subtitle F of title I of the act may be cited as "OIG Auditing Reform Amendment Act of 2011".

DC CODE § 2-381.08

Current through December 11, 2012
